summary: This document contains the resolutions of Neptune, LLC, authorizing Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas to act as a depositary, custodian, or investment advisor for the company. It outlines the powers granted to authorized signers, including Jeffrey Epstein, to manage accounts and execute agreements on behalf of the company.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is listed as an authorized signer for Neptune, LLC, with the power to manage accounts and execute agreements.

persons.name: Darren Indyk
persons.context: Darren Indyk is mentioned as another authorized signer for Neptune, LLC, with similar powers as Epstein.

connections.description: Both Epstein and Indyk are authorized signers for Neptune, LLC, allowing them to manage accounts and execute agreements.

keyFacts: Neptune, LLC is a limited liability company formed in Delaware.
The document certifies the resolutions adopted by the members of Neptune, LLC.
Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas is designated as the depositary, custodian, or investment advisor for Neptune, LLC.
Jeffrey Epstein and Darren Indyk are authorized signers for Neptune, LLC.
The document outlines the powers and responsibilities of the authorized signers regarding the management of accounts.
